summary: UPON HITTING A BUMP AT HIGHWAY SPEED BUS BOUNCES ERRATICALLY LIKE A SEE-SAW. IF DRIVER NOT BELT COULD BE THROWN OUT OF SEAT.  IN ADDITION, FUEL FILLER PIPE  IS LOCATED BETWEEN DRIVER AXLE AND TAG AXLE. ON SEVERAL INSTANCES WHEN A TIRE BLEW OUT IT CAUSED THE FUEL FILLER PIPE TO DISCONNECT AND FUEL SPILLAGE.  *AK
